skills.name: Active
skills.description: [SP: 0][CD: 0] Use the bow to aim and shoot (max aiming duration: 3s), dealing 600.0% ATK of Physical DMG. Hitting an enemy weakspot deals 800.0% ATK of Physical DMG. When SP is greater than 30, consumes 30 SP and drops an SP pack which recovers 15 SP for the whole team. The weapon active's CD and charging time are based on the shooting mode.

skills.name: Passive
skills.description: Team Total DMG +6.0%. When user enters the field, restores 30 SP, CD: 60s.
